titles.title: Kisatchie National Forest Land Conveyance Act
Kisatchie National Forest Land Conveyance Act
To provide for the conveyance of certain National Forest System land within Kisatchie National Forest in the State of Louisiana.
Kisatchie National Forest Land Conveyance Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation and Forestry.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

bill.summary:
Kisatchie National Forest Land Conveyance Act
This bill authorizes the Department of Agriculture (USDA) to sell specified federal land in Winn Parish, Louisiana. USDA shall convey a portion of that land to Collins Camp Properties, Inc.
